extension.name: Find Us on Facebook
extension.author: Joomladds @ River Media
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2012 River Media. All rights reserved.
extension.description:
Find Us On Facebook

This module will display a "Find Us On Facebook" badge with your choice of 8 images on your website in the desired module position. We currently support only one additional language besides English mainly because the Italian images were supplied by a user. If you would like to see additional languages added, feel free to submit them to us.
If you are upgrading from any version prior to 1.2.1, please uninstall this module, then reinstall. This will resolve an issue with an incorrect Update Server URL.

This Extension Proudly offered by: JoomLadds.com
Support: http://joomladds.com/forum/fuofb
Tutorials: http://joomladds.com/tutorials/fuofb
